pull.title: ci: remove ccache version pin in MSVC CI
pull.body: The pinning should no-longer be needed; 4.6.2 was broken, latest is 4.7.4, and that includes the necessary fixes.

tree 1c00c63a062aaab7cfab59aa8be366b8d5618f46
parent 4586ae2da1a4532dff459d6824b10bd329a5e824
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1673367324 +0000
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1673433185 +0000

ci: remove ccache version pin in MSVC CI

The pinning should no-longer be needed; 4.6.2 was broken, latest is
4.7.4, and that includes the necessary fixes.

events.message:
ci: remove ccache version pin in MSVC CI

The pinning should no-longer be needed; 4.6.2 was broken, latest is
4.7.4, and that includes the necessary fixes.

events.body: Chocolately seems to have fixed itself, so I've changed the wording here to just drop the ccache version pin, as it's no-longer necessary, and I don't think we've got a reason to remain pinned.
NACK. The reason is that a broken version will break our CI and we'll have to pin it to fix the problem. Everything else is pinned, so why should this not be pinned?

> Everything else is pinned, so why should this not be pinned?

In this case I don't care too much either way, but I think if we are going to have things pinned, (in general) we could document why. This was pinned because of a bug that has since been fixed, and staying pinned is at best, worse than using the latest working version (i.e pinning to 4.6.x is just missing [multiple performance improvements / bug fixes](https://ccache.dev/releasenotes.html#_new_and_improved_features) over 4.7.x). I guess the better change here is too just change the pin to 4.7.4, but feel free to close.

No objection to bumping it or adding documentation.

ccache (for windows) isn't really used, looking at the download numbers, https://community.chocolatey.org/packages/ccache#versionhistory, so I'd prefer if someone else is doing the nightly testing outside of our production CI

issue.title: ci: Update "Win64 native" task
issue.body:
This PR bumps `vcpkg` and `ccache` versions.

Dependency changes in `vcpkg` ([2022.09.27](https://github.com/microsoft/vcpkg/releases/tag/2022.09.27) - [2023.01.09](https://github.com/microsoft/vcpkg/releases/tag/2023.01.09)):
 - boost 1.80.0#0 -> 1.81.0#0
 - libevent 2.1.12#6 -> libevent 2.1.12#7
 - sqlite3 3.39.2#0 -> 3.40.0#1

Also see https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26866#issuecomment-1378591258.
